divs: Sighting Details One multi-color object stayed in the same place for approximately two hours. I was in a road (Fern���o Dias interstate) driving to north. This object was blinking and my first opinion I was watching a commercial plane, but the light was strong and blinking like a cell phone antenna (cell site). But near Pouso Alegre, Cambu���, Varginha and all region, there is no airport with commercial flights. The half moon was on my left and the object was visible on my front. Suddenly the object flashes and make an trajectory like a shooting star and disappeared.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Pouso Alegre
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Multi-color blinking like one cell site.
